channel.title: Corporal Beast + Tormented Demons

item.title: Corporal Beast + Tormented Demons
item.dc:creator: @iHybridu iHybridu
item.description:
@iHybridu wrote:

I’ve never added models before so hopefully someone can help me.

Questions:

if(i == 1) {

//Change it. - I’m assuming I need the NPC Id. All my lists are outdated What is the ID?

if(i == 2) {

// Change it. - Same problem as ^

The Animation ID’s - I have no clue what to do with those

Tormented Demon:

if(i == 1) { // Change it.
entityDef.actions = new String[5];
entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; 
entityDef.models = new int[1];
entityDef.models[0] = 44733;
entityDef.standAnim = 10921;
entityDef.walkAnim  = 10920;
entityDef.combatLevel = 450;
entityDef.name = "Tormented demon";
entityDef.description = "Lucien must be incredibly powerful if he can bind such demons to his will.".getBytes();
}

Corporal Beast:

if(i == 2) { // Change it.
entityDef.actions = new String[5];
entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; 
entityDef.models = new int[1];
entityDef.models[0] = 44733;
entityDef.standAnim = 10921;
entityDef.walkAnim  = 10920;
entityDef.combatLevel = 785;
entityDef.name = "Corporeal beast";
entityDef.description = "A vision of supernatural horror.".getBytes();
}
